MoveMouseSmooth (x,y);
[/scar]

that might work…

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @chef_autoer chef_autoer
item.description:
@chef_autoer wrote:

ok… Thx un-named! Ill try… This is my first script so…

E: Still doesnt work argh… here what i made it this time…
[scar]//Script by: Chef_autoer
program New;
{include SRL/SRL.scar}

const
ItemColor1 = 1648937; // Into 9407370 place put Ure first item color
ItemColor2 = 9407370; // And so on…
ItemColor3 = 9407370;
ItemColor4 = 9407370;
ItemColor5 = 9407370;
ItemColor6 = 9407370;
ItemColor7 = 9407370;

var
x, y, Clicks: Integer;
procedure ClickColor;

begin
if (findcolor (x, y, ItemColor1, 824, 470, 990, 717)) or
(findcolor (x, y, ItemColor2, 824, 470, 990, 717)) or
(findcolor (x, y, ItemColor3, 824, 470, 990, 717)) or
(findcolor (x, y, ItemColor4, 824, 470, 990, 717)) or
(findcolor (x, y, ItemColor5, 824, 470, 990, 717)) or
(findcolor (x, y, ItemColor6, 824, 470, 990, 717)) or
(findcolor (x, y, ItemColor7, 824, 470, 990, 717)) then
begin;
MoveMouseSmooth (x,y);
Wait (200)
ClickMouse(x,y,True);
end;
end;

procedure ProgressReport;
begin

end;

begin
Clickcolor;

end.
[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“arr0w, post:2, topic:25916”]MoveMouseSmooth (x,y); Wait (200) ClickMouse(x,y,True);
You dont give it enough time to move the mouse make it wait 3000+random(500));[/quote]

Don’t answer if you can’t. SCAR doesn’t move on to the next command until the current command has been clicked. The problem is the “or” in the findcolor.

chef_autoer, You can’t use or INSIDE the findcolor statement, you would need to do something like: (* You can but it will only find the highest integer value. *)

if(FindColor(x, y, Color1, 343, 424, 244, 424) or
(FindColor(x, y, Color2, 343, 424, 244, 424)) then

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @chef_autoer chef_autoer
item.description:
@chef_autoer wrote:

So i wrote this script which is not working well(it doesnt click)… Here it is:
[scar]//Script by: Chef_autoer
program N00bieScript;
{include SRL/SRL.scar}

const
ItemColor1 = 1648937; // Into 9407370 place put Ure first item color
ItemColor2 = 9407370; // And so on…
ItemColor3 = 9407370;
ItemColor4 = 9407370;
ItemColor5 = 9407370;
ItemColor6 = 9407370;
ItemColor7 = 9407370;

var
x, y, Clicks: Integer;
procedure ClickColor;

begin
if (findcolor (x, y, ItemColor1 or ItemColor2 or ItemColor3 or ItemColor4 or ItemColor5 or ItemColor6 or ItemColor7, 824, 470, 990, 717)) then
begin;
MoveMouseSmooth (x,y);
Wait (200)
ClickMouse(x,y,True);
end;
end;

procedure ProgressReport;
begin

end;

begin
Clickcolor;

end.
[/scar]
And when i click run it says this:
Successfully compiled
Line 15: [Hint] (15:22): Variable ‘CLICKS’ never used in script E:\Riku\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\Scripti sähellys.scar
Successfully executed

Read full topic
